types:type.name: empresponseJson
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type empresponseJson = {| emp_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, emp_name: String, designation: String, salary: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"emp_id\\\":1,\\\"emp_name\\\":\\\"fgh\\\",\\\"designation\\\":\\\"SE\\\",\\\"salary\\\":65431}"}

types:type.name: empResponseListJson
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type empResponseListJson = Array<{| empid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empname: String, designation: String, empsal: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"empid\\\":1,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"fgh\\\",\\\"designation\\\":\\\"SE\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":65431},{\\\"empid\\\":1,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"fgh\\\",\\\"designation\\\":\\\"SE\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":65431}]"}
